document_data.name: Arla's Dragonbane
document_data.text: It would seem that halflings prefer entertainment over accuracy when it comes to their history.
document_data.source: Item description from the ''[[Baldur's Gate series]]''
document_data.mainbody: The [[halfling]] adventurer, Arla Surestep, used the [[magic]]al weapon to slay a [[green dragon]]. She fired a [[bullet]] through its large skull in mid-flight, felling the creature.
document_data.Rumors: It was rumored that Arla actually slew the dragon by firing the bullet squarely into the creature's buttocks for humor, rather than lethal effect.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Arla Surestep]], whom the weapon was named after.
